config_part.ioc_desc: New CAEN high voltage power supply driver

macro.name: READ_ONLY
macro.description: Whether device is readonly. 1 for readonly, 0 for read and write.

macro.name: IP_ADDRESS_0
macro.description: IP address of the first device.

macro.name: SYS_TYPE_0
macro.description: The type of CAEN. 0, 1, 2, 3 for SYS1527, SYS2527, SYS4527 and SYS5527 respectively.

macro.name: IP_ADDRESS_1
macro.description: IP address of the second device.

macro.name: SYS_TYPE_1
macro.description: The type of CAEN. 0, 1, 2, 3 for SYS1527, SYS2527, SYS4527 and SYS5527 respectively.

macro.name: IP_ADDRESS_2
macro.description: IP address of the third device.

macro.name: SYS_TYPE_2
macro.description: The type of CAEN. 0, 1, 2, 3 for SYS1527, SYS2527, SYS4527 and SYS5527 respectively.

macro.name: IP_ADDRESS_3
macro.description: IP address of the fourth device.

macro.name: SYS_TYPE_3
macro.description: The type of CAEN. 0, 1, 2, 3 for SYS1527, SYS2527, SYS4527 and SYS5527 respectively.
